Generated by LiveScript 1.3.0

1 : ref$; j$ <= end; ++j$) { n = j$; traces[i] += "\n" + (' ' + n).slice(-length) + "" + '|+'.charAt(n === lno) + " " + [lines[n - 1]]; } } return error.stack = traces.join('\n'), error; } function import$(obj, src){ var own = {}.hasOwnProperty; for (var key in src) if (own.call(src, key)) obj[key] = src[key]; return obj; } function importAll$(obj, src){ for (var key in src) obj[key] = src[key]; return obj; }
